1.name: User Authentication
1.description: Implement secure login, signup, and password reset. Includes email verification and two-factor authentication for account security.

2.name: Menu Management
2.description: Allow restaurant admin to create, update, and delete menu items, organize them into categories, and manage pricing.

3.name: Online Ordering
3.description: Enable customers to select items from the menu, add to cart, and place orders online with an order confirmation system.

4.name: Payment Integration
4.description: Integrate multiple payment methods including credit cards, mobile wallets, and digital banking.

5.name: Table Reservation System
5.description: Allow customers to book tables online with real-time availability updates and confirmation notifications.

6.name: Order Tracking
6.description: Let customers track order status in real-time, from preparation to delivery or table service.

7.name: Customer Reviews & Ratings
7.description: Allow customers to submit reviews and ratings for dishes and the restaurant overall, with moderation tools for admins.

8.name: Promotions and Discounts
8.description: Implement coupon codes, special offers, and loyalty programs for customers.

9.name: Admin Dashboard
9.description: Provide restaurant admins a dashboard to manage orders, track performance, and access analytics

10.name: Notifications and Alerts
10.description: Send customers email, SMS, or app push notifications for order updates, offers, and reservation confirmations.

11.name: Mobile Responsiveness
11.description: Ensure website design works smoothly on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.

12.name: Multi-language Support
12.description: Allow users to switch between languages to accommodate international customers.

13.name: Customer Support Chatbot
13.description: Add an AI-powered chatbot for answering customer queries, assisting with orders, and providing recommendations.

14.name: Inventory Management
14.description: Enable admins to monitor ingredient stock levels, automatically update menu availability, and notify when restocking is needed.

15.name: Analytics and Reporting
15.description: Provide detailed analytics on orders, revenue, customer activity, and reviews for informed decision-making.
